page.title: 20ARTISTIC YALDING
page.content: Local people are skilled at a variety of arts and crafts, including wine-making, needlework and embroidery, pottery, flower arranging, painting in watercolours, sketching, and in canework which includes re- seating chairs. Yalding High Street includes a blacksmith's shop and forge; although no working horses remain horses and ponies are kept for leisure. The local blacksmith is of high repute, having travelled to the USA to demonstrate his skills. A potter and a printer have premises nearby. This block was surveyed and researched by groups of children from Yalding CE Primary School assisted by parents and friends and with slides kindly contributed by 2 villagers. The written work is by the Headmaster in consultation with group leaders.
